mapper.update: update RECIPE set TITLE=#{title}, INFO=#{info}, FOOD=#{food}, FOOD_PHOTO=#{foodPhoto}, SORT=#{sort}, INGREDIENT=#{ingredient}, SERVING=#{serving}, COOK_TIME=#{cookTime}, DIFFICULTY_LEVEL=#{difficultyLevel}, UPDATE_DATE=SYSDATE, ACCESSIBILITY=#{accessibility} where ID=#{id}
update INGREDIENT set INGREDIENT_TYPE=#{ingredientType}, INGREDIENT=#{ingredient}, QUANTITY=#{quantity} where ID=#{id}
mapper.select: select NVL(MAX(ID),0) from RECIPE where M_EMAIL=#{email}
select * from RECIPE where ID=#{id}
select * from INGREDIENT where R_ID=#{rId}
select * from DIRECTION where R_ID=#{rId}
select * from RECIPE_TAG where R_ID=#{rId}
select * from (select ROWNUM list, ID, FOOD_PHOTO, TITLE, FOOD, PROFILE_IMG, M_NICKNAME, M_EMAIL, STAR, STARS, HITS from RECIPE) where list BETWEEN #{beginRow} AND #{endRow} order by ID desc

select * from (select ROWNUM list, ID, FOOD_PHOTO, TITLE, FOOD, PROFILE_IMG, M_NICKNAME, M_EMAIL, STAR, STARS, HITS from RECIPE where POST_DATE BETWEEN CURRENT_DATE-#{period} AND CURRENT_DATE) where list BETWEEN #{beginRow} AND #{endRow} order by ID desc

choose.when: select * from (select ROWNUM list, ID, FOOD_PHOTO, title, FOOD, PROFILE_IMG, M_NICKNAME, M_EMAIL, STAR, STARS, HITS from (select * from RECIPE where POST_DATE BETWEEN CURRENT_DATE-#{period} AND CURRENT_DATE intersect select * from RECIPE where SORT like '%'||#{category}||'%' OR INGREDIENT like '%'||#{category}||'%')) where list BETWEEN #{beginRow} AND #{endRow} order by ID desc
choose.otherwise: select * from (select ROWNUM list, ID, FOOD_PHOTO, title, FOOD, PROFILE_IMG, M_NICKNAME, M_EMAIL, STAR, STARS, HITS from (select * from RECIPE where SORT like '%'||#{category}||'%' OR INGREDIENT like '%'||#{category}||'%')) where list BETWEEN #{beginRow} AND #{endRow} order by ID desc

choose.when: select * from (select ROWNUM list, ID, FOOD_PHOTO, title, FOOD, PROFILE_IMG, M_NICKNAME, M_EMAIL, STAR, STARS, HITS from (select * from RECIPE where POST_DATE BETWEEN CURRENT_DATE-#{period} AND CURRENT_DATE intersect select * from RECIPE where ${nameOption} like '%'||#{keyword}||'%')) where list BETWEEN #{beginRow} AND #{endRow} order by ID desc
choose.otherwise: select * from (select ROWNUM list, ID, FOOD_PHOTO, title, FOOD, PROFILE_IMG, M_NICKNAME, M_EMAIL, STAR, STARS, HITS from (select * from RECIPE where ${nameOption} like '%'||#{keyword}||'%')) where list BETWEEN #{beginRow} AND #{endRow} order by ID desc

choose.when: select * from (select ROWNUM list, ID, FOOD_PHOTO, TITLE, FOOD, PROFILE_IMG, M_NICKNAME, M_EMAIL, STAR, STARS, HITS from (select ID, FOOD_PHOTO, TITLE, FOOD, PROFILE_IMG, M_NICKNAME, M_EMAIL, STAR, STARS, HITS from RECIPE where POST_DATE BETWEEN CURRENT_DATE-#{period} AND CURRENT_DATE intersect select DISTINCT(r.ID) ID, r.FOOD_PHOTO, r.TITLE, r.FOOD, r.PROFILE_IMG, r.M_NICKNAME, r.M_EMAIL, r.STAR, r.STARS, r.HITS from RECIPE r left join INGREDIENT ingr on r.ID=ingr.R_ID where ingr.INGREDIENT like '%'||#{keyword}||'%')) where list BETWEEN #{beginRow} AND #{endRow} order by ID desc
choose.otherwise: select * from (select ROWNUM list, ID, FOOD_PHOTO, TITLE, FOOD, PROFILE_IMG, M_NICKNAME, M_EMAIL, STAR, STARS, HITS from (select DISTINCT(r.ID) ID, r.FOOD_PHOTO, r.TITLE, r.FOOD, r.PROFILE_IMG, r.M_NICKNAME, r.M_EMAIL, r.STAR, r.STARS, r.HITS from RECIPE r left join INGREDIENT ingr on r.ID=ingr.R_ID where ingr.INGREDIENT like '%'||#{keyword}||'%') order by ID desc) where list BETWEEN #{beginRow} AND #{endRow}

mapper.select: select * from (select ID, FOOD_PHOTO, TITLE, FOOD, PROFILE_IMG, M_NICKNAME, M_EMAIL, STAR, STARS, HITS from RECIPE order by DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM) where ROWNUM BETWEEN #{beginRow} AND #{endRow}
select * from (select ROWNUM list, ID, FOOD_PHOTO, TITLE, FOOD, PROFILE_IMG, M_NICKNAME, M_EMAIL, STAR, STARS, HITS from (${query})) where list BETWEEN #{beginRow} AND #{endRow}

select * from (select ROWNUM list, ID, FOOD_PHOTO, TITLE, FOOD, PROFILE_IMG, M_NICKNAME, M_EMAIL, STAR, STARS, HITS from RECIPE where M_EMAIL=#{email}) where list BETWEEN #{beginRow} AND #{endRow} order by ID desc

select * from (select ROWNUM list, ID, FOOD_PHOTO, TITLE, FOOD, PROFILE_IMG, M_NICKNAME, M_EMAIL, STAR, STARS, HITS from RECIPE where M_EMAIL=#{email} and ACCESSIBILITY=#{type}) where list BETWEEN #{beginRow} AND #{endRow} order by ID desc

select * from (select ROWNUM list, sid, ID, FOOD_PHOTO, TITLE, FOOD, PROFILE_IMG, M_NICKNAME, M_EMAIL, STAR, STARS, HITS from (select DISTINCT(r.ID), s.ID sid, r.FOOD_PHOTO, r.TITLE, r.FOOD, r.PROFILE_IMG, r.M_NICKNAME, r.M_EMAIL, r.STAR, r.STARS, r.HITS from RECIPE r inner join SCRAP s on r.ID = s.R_ID where r.M_EMAIL=#{email})) where list BETWEEN #{beginRow} AND #{endRow} order by sid desc
select ID, FOOD_PHOTO, TITLE, SORT from RECIPE where ID=#{id}

choose.otherwise: select NVL(MAX(ROWNUM), 0) from (select * from RECIPE where ${nameOption} like '%'||#{keyword}||'%')
